text: Coach Albert is a very patient, punctual and knowledgable tennis coach. Strong focus on fundamentals, tennis lessons pacing is methodical to ensure you are confident and successful with each new technique he taught before moving on to the next. Highly recommended!

Coach Albert is awesome! He makes learning tennis so much fun and really knows how to teach the basics in a way that’s easy to understand. I’ve improved so much thanks to his guidance, and I look forward to every session despite by busy schedule as a medic! Highly recommend his lessons for beginners :)

I've had the pleasure of working with Coach Albert for roughly 9 months now and I can confidently say that he is an exceptional tennis coach. His ability to identify areas for improvement and provide personalized feedback that is both constructive and motivating helped me in my game. I would defo recommend him to players of all levels looking to improve their skills in tennis!
Very great coach with amazing teaching techniques and methods.  Coach Albert made my tennis learning journey possible.
Coach Teo really emphasizes on learning the basics correctly, with a focus on having effective biomechanics .  Will definitely work with him again the next time I’m in town
